title: The Penalty

I've been a police officer for 31 years, these are the worst crimes and these people deserve the death penalty.
Trust me, a death penalty case is a lot different than just a regular murder case. I've learned that.
I don't think he should get the death penalty, cause there's no sense in killing somebody else.
